dsOverview.title: TIGGE Tropical Cyclone Track Data

summary.p: This dataset holds all THORPEX Interactive Grand Global Ensemble (TIGGE) tropical cyclone track data online for internet download. Ensemble generated tropical cyclone track data from the European Center for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ecmf), United Kingdom Met Office (egrr), National Centers for Environmental Prediction (kwbc), Japan Meteorological Agency (rjtd), China Meteorological Administration (babj), Meteorological Service of Canada (cwao), MeteoFrance (lfpw), and Korea Meteorological Administration (rksl) will be archived as they become available.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
DOC/NOAA/NWS/NCEP > National Centers for Environmental Prediction, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
GB/MOD/MET > Met Office, Ministry of Defence, United Kingdom
CA/EC/MSC > Meteorological Service of Canada, Environment Canada
KR/KMA > Korean Meteorological Administration, Republic of Korea

usage.p: Usage is restricted to non-commercial, educational and research purposes only.
